document.forum_title: Latest Asia-Pacific News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Hundreds of flights cancelled as typhoon hits Tokyo
document.topic_text: Hundreds of flights cancelled as typhoon hits Tokyo Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 18 minutes ago ) Officials have warned of landslides and flooding as Typhoon Mindulle delivers gusts of up to 180 km/h near Tokyo.
document.post: Hundreds of flights cancelled as typhoon hits Tokyo Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 18 minutes ago ) Officials have warned of landslides and flooding as Typhoon Mindulle delivers gusts of up to 180 km/h near Tokyo.
